Interest Form

Project Timeline

We’re actively seeking partners and funding for Phase 1 implementation. The Oracle Entity Project is designed to launch in museum settings by late 2025, with AR expansion following in 2026.

Join the Conversation

The Oracle Entity Project represents a new frontier in experiential learning and cultural preservation. Whether you’re an educator, museum professional, technologist, or funding partner, we invite you to be part of this groundbreaking initiative.
